text: Yakshcho zh vony pochnutʹ sperechatysya z toboyu, to skazhy: «YA pidkoryv sebe Allahu razom iz tymy, khto pishov za mnoyu!» I skazhy tym, yakym dano Pysannya, a takozh nepysʹmennym: «Chy ne pidkorytesya y vy?» I yakshcho vony pidkoryatʹsya, to pidutʹ shlyakhom pryamym. A yakshcho vidvernutʹsya, to ty vidpovidayesh lyshe za te, shchob peredaty yim tse. Allah bachytʹ rabiv
